First off I tried Milt's second link this morning and it worked fine.  I 
didn't even have to sign into Yahoo.  It allowed me to view them as a guest, which 
seems to be something new.  Now my attempt to name the schools.

I have no idea what school the rat is from.

su1 is most likely a kyo piece see nicer much finer (thinner work) 
@(Artswords.com the page was down for maintenance or I would have given the direct link) 
or a copy of a kyo piece (the two ovoid anna are significant of a particular 
school are they not? I'm too lazy to mull through all my texts right now to 
find what school it is) I liked this piece but just didn't bid enough at the 
end, oh well.

su3 is late owari (my guess without dimensions or thickness)

su5 could be Tosa or Shoami and a long shot would be Akasaka.  I would have 
to say it is most likely Tosa with all that fine engraving on it.

These are my guesses Milt, now you see how little I know.  Would love to hear 
what you think they are Milt.  Also would like to hear from the experts to 
learn a little something.

Lou
